issues.description: Zero clicks on 3816 content entries - content not reaching audience
Zero clicks on 11155 campaign entries - affiliate links not working

root_causes.cause: No sales are being made, possibly due to lack of engagement with content and campaigns.
Content is not reaching the audience. This could be due to issues with the syndication platforms, poor content quality, or the content not being targeted to the right audience.
Affiliate links are not working. This could be due to technical issues with the affiliate automation system or the links themselves.

fixes.action: Investigate and fix issues with affiliate links
fixes.expected_impact: Increase in campaign clicks and potential revenue
implementation_steps: Check the affiliate automation system for errors
Test the affiliate links to ensure they are working
Review the affiliate campaign setup to ensure it is configured correctly

fixes.expected_impact: Increase in content clicks and potential leads
implementation_steps: Review content for quality and relevance to the target audience
Analyze audience data to better understand their interests and needs
Adjust content strategy based on audience analysis

fixes.expected_impact: Increase in content reach and potential engagement
implementation_steps: Identify which platforms are not receiving syndicated content
Investigate potential issues with the syndication process for these platforms
Implement fixes for any identified issues

fix.action: Investigate and fix issues with affiliate links
fix.expected_impact: Increase in campaign clicks and potential revenue
implementation_steps: Check the affiliate automation system for errors
Test the affiliate links to ensure they are working
Review the affiliate campaign setup to ensure it is configured correctly

implementation_steps: Review content for quality and relevance to the target audience
